mod.name: The Bug Knight
mod.credits: Thanks in part due to the efforts of Gremious, the Great people at the STS Modding Discord, and of course: Team Cherry, Simplified Chinese Translations provided by AmethystProductions.
mod.description: A mod that attempts to add the Knight from Hollow Knight as a Playable Character, NL All rights for Hollow Knight belong to Team Cherry. NL Please Support them by playing Hollow Knight: https://hollowknight.com/. NL Hollow Knight: Silksong is coming out soon!

relics.name: Knight's Mask
relics.description: Gain 1 hollowmod:Soul each time you play an Attack card. (Except hollowmod:Spell or Ally Attacks)

relics.name: Isma's Tear
relics.description: WheneverInfection damages you, take 1 less damage.
relics.flavorText: Fruit formed from a single hardened tear.

relics.name: Millibelle's Note
relics.flavorText: Still not interested? You're far too hesitant.

relics.name: Pale Ore
relics.flavorText: Prized by those who craft weapons.

relics.name: The King's Brand
relics.description: As long as you have enough Infection, Focus will spend Infection instead of Soul (Even while in Void).
relics.flavorText: Hallownest's ancient places shall open before it.

relics.name: Delicate Flower
relics.description: If your HP is Full, gain Max Soul at the Beginning of Each turn.
relics.flavorText: The Grey Mourner sends her Love.

relics.name: Life Ender
relics.description: Draw a card after playing 5 attacks.
relics.flavorText: Another fool to be cut down by Life Ender...

relics.name: Lumafly Lantern
relics.description: Whenever you draw an Ally gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: Brightens dark caverns so wanderers can find their way.

relics.name: Mantis Claw
relics.description: Whenever you play 3 Dash cards in one turn, gain 1 [E]

relics.name: Queens Comb
relics.description: Upon Pickup Lose 50% Max HP. Until you take health damage each combat: At the beginning of your turn: heal for 4 HP.
relics.flavorText: Golden nugget of the Hive's precious comb.

relics.name: Stag's Pass
relics.description: Cards Purchased from Shops are automatically upgraded.
relics.flavorText: The sound of the bell will always call me back.

relics.name: KingsSoul
relics.description: Replaces Knight's Mask or Void Idol. Gain 4 Soul at the beginning of your turn. Increases Soul Meter Limit by 2
relics.flavorText: Holy charm symbolising a union between higher beings.

relics.name: Void Idol
relics.description: Replaces Knight's Mask or King's Soul. You can no longer Gain Soul. Void cards lose Exhaust. At the beginning of each combat, -1 Dexterity, -1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: A Mask formed of liquid from the Abyss, perfectly still.

relics.name: The Great Knight's Mask
relics.flavorText: Fear not, cur... Your death will be swift

relics.name: GodTuner
relics.description: Gain 1 [E] at the start of each turn. Soul Meter Limit is reduced by 3.
relics.flavorText: Device that resonates with beings of great power.

relics.name: Joni's Blessing
relics.description: Begin each combat with 15 Temporary HP. Healing in combat instead increases Temporary HP.
relics.flavorText: Blessed by Joni, the kindly heretic. Transfigures vital fluids into blue lifeblood.
